code: import Bill from'../pages/Bill';import Login from'../pages/Login';import Home from'../pages/Home';import Tax from'../pages/Tax';import Error404 from'../components/Error404';import HeaderOnly from'../components/Layout/HeaderOnly';var publicRoutes=[];if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('access_token'))===null){publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'/thue',component:Tax,layout:null},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}else{publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'/home',component:Home,layout:HeaderOnly},{path:'/bill',component:Bill,layout:HeaderOnly},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}var privateRoutes=[];export{publicRoutes,privateRoutes};
